name: Sin Seer
text: Unlike others who have taken the oath against undeath (see page 60), your preoccupation with the undead does not cloud your view of good and evil.
benefit: You gain the detect evil class feature. You may use it or the detect undead class feature, but not at the same time.
text_zh: 和其他为了对抗亡灵而接受诅咒的人不同（间第60页），对亡灵的全神贯注并不会影响你的善恶观。
prerequisites_zh: 【侦测亡灵】圣骑士职业特性。【编注：【侦测亡灵（Detect Undead）】是圣骑士反亡灵誓约（Oath against Undeath, UM）的1级能力。】。
benefit_zh: 你获得【侦测邪恶】职业特性。你可以使用【侦测邪恶】或者【侦测亡灵】，但不能同时使用两者。
